statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT product_name, consumed_energy FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, product_name, consumed_energy, location, date_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date_consumed DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, consumed_energy, location FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumed_energy > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'California' AND consumed_energy BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumed_energy > 100 ORDER BY date_consumed DESC;
SELECT product_name, consumed_energy FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND date_consumed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY consumed_energy ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY location ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(consumed_energy) AS avg_energy, location FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT MAX(consumed_energy) AS max_energy, MIN(consumed_energy) AS min_energy, SUM(consumed_energy) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, energy_source, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY consumption DESC;
SELECT id, action, impact, efficiency FROM optimization_efforts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY location, timestamp;
SELECT location, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location HAVING total_consumption > 500 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location HAVING total_consumption > 100 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT e.location, e.energy_source, o.action FROM energy_consumption e INNER JOIN optimization_efforts o ON e.timestamp = o.timestamp WHERE e.consumption > o.impact ORDER BY e.timestamp;
SELECT location, AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_consumption ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainOptimization WHERE cost_saved < 5000;
SELECT id, location, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT location, energy_type, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 AND location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainOptimization WHERE cost_saved > 5000 ORDER BY optimization_id ASC, cost_saved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 4 AND location = 'Office Building' ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT company_name, energy_type, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM energy_supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM supply_chain_location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT id, optimization_technique, efficiency_rating FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY optimization_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND energy_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM energy_supplier WHERE id = 10 OR supplier_name LIKE '%Power%';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM supply_chain_location WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT id, optimization_technique, efficiency_rating FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE optimization_date >= '2022-01-01' AND optimization_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_consumption > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT shipment_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, sender, receiver, shipment_date FROM shipment_details WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT source_name, energy_units FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'solar' ORDER BY energy_units DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_optimization_log WHERE strategy_used = 'greedy' AND optimization_time < 100;
SELECT * FROM shipment_details ORDER BY shipment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender, receiver, shipment_date FROM shipment_details WHERE sender = 'Company A';
SELECT id, shipment_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE energy_units > 100 ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT shipment_id, optimization_strategy, optimization_result FROM supply_chain_optimization WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
